trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Sirve de clase base para los diseñadores que proporcionan compatibilidad en tiempo de diseño en el diseñador Web visual para los controles que se derivan de la clase abstracta <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" />.

trans-unit.source: In the Visual Web Designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: En el Diseñador Web Visual, cuando el usuario cambia de origen a la vista de diseño, el código fuente de marcado que describe un control derivado de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> clase se analiza y se crea una versión en tiempo de diseño del control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el usuario vuelve a cambiar a la vista código fuente, el control de tiempo de diseño se conserva en el código fuente de marcado y editar en el marcado de la página Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> clase que actúa como clase base para los diseñadores que proporcionan compatibilidad en tiempo de diseño en el Diseñador Web Visual para los controles que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class properties provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> propiedades de la clase proporcionan la funcionalidad siguiente:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propiedad devuelve un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto, que normalmente contiene un objeto que se deriva de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objeto para cada nivel del árbol de herencia del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> propiedades proporcionan acceso a las propiedades correspondientes de un control que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> indicate the fields of the data source that provide the text and value content of the list items, respectively.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> indicar los campos del origen de datos que proporcionen el texto y el valor contenido de los elementos de lista, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class methods provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> métodos de la clase proporcionan la funcionalidad siguiente:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> método enlaza el control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> a un origen de datos en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método devuelve el marcado que se usa para representar el control asociado en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método devuelve el tiempo de diseño <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> componente del contenedor del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> from the control container, resolved to the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> método devuelve el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> del contenedor del control, que se resuelve en el tiempo de diseño <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> propiedad del control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view and design the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método prepara el diseñador para ver y diseñar el control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> se llama al método cuando el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> para el control asociado ha cambiado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove additional properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método se usa para quitar propiedades adicionales, agregarle propiedades adicionales o sombrear las propiedades del control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>.

trans-unit.source: This section provides two code examples.
trans-unit.target: Esta sección proporciona dos ejemplos de código.

trans-unit.source: The first demonstrates how to derive a custom control designer.
trans-unit.target: El primero muestra cómo derivar un diseñador de controles personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The second demonstrates how to associate a derived control with a designer.
trans-unit.target: El segundo ejemplo muestra cómo asociar un control derivado a un diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a class named `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo crear una clase denominada `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` que herede de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: El `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` clase invalida la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>, y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class displays a `SimpleRadioButtonList` control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: El `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` clase muestra un `SimpleRadioButtonList` control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The following code example derives the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> control, and shows how to use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> class to associate the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control with its designer, the `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se deriva el `SimpleRadioButtonList` controlar desde la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList> controlar y muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> clase para asociar el `SimpleRadioButtonList` control con su diseñador, la `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` clase.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework crea internamente una nueva instancia de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> clase cuando se crea el control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> clase en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección de listas de acciones del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Colección <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> asociada al diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The associated control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" />, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: Control asociado que se deriva de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" />, o una copia del control.

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Enlaza el control especificado al origen de datos en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> base class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> object to reference the design-time data source, then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and then restores the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> properties to their original values.
trans-unit.target: Para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner> de la clase base la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> método establece la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> propiedades de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> objeto de referencia de origen de datos de tiempo de diseño, a continuación, llama el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método y, a continuación, restauraciones el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> propiedades a sus valores originales.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class, however, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> method has no functionality, because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> objects were just added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> (clase), sin embargo, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A> método no tiene ninguna funcionalidad, porque <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> objetos simplemente se agregaron a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> colección.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data text field of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el campo de texto de datos del control.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField" /> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField" /> del control de lista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> property sets or retrieves the markup to use for the design-time representation of the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A> propiedad establece o recupera el marcado que se utilizará para la representación en tiempo de diseño del control en tiempo de ejecución.

trans-unit.source: This provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> property of the associated control, which corresponds to the field of the data source that provides the text content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: Esto proporciona acceso a través del diseñador para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> propiedad del control asociado, que se corresponde con el campo del origen de datos que proporciona el contenido de texto de los elementos de lista.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data value field of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el campo de valor de datos del control.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField" /> of the list control.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField" /> del control de lista.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> property provides access via the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> property of the associated control, which indicates the field of the data source that provides the value content of the list items.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A> propiedad proporciona acceso a través del diseñador para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> propiedad del control asociado, lo que indica el campo del origen de datos que proporciona el contenido del valor de los elementos de lista.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el código HTML que se usa para representar el control en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the markup used to render the control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contiene el marcado utilizado para representar el control que se deriva de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object is data-bound, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection and adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Si el control asociado derivado de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> objeto está enlazado a datos, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método borra el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> colección y agrega un <xref:System.String> mensaje que indica que el control está enlazado a datos.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control is not data-bound and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> adds a <xref:System.String> message indicating the control is unbound.
trans-unit.target: Si el control asociado no está enlazado a datos y la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> colección está vacía, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> agrega un <xref:System.String> mensaje que indica que el control no está enlazado.

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> calls its base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> llama a su método base para generar el marcado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to customize the markup that is displayed for the associated control on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente código de ejemplo reemplaza el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para personalizar el marcado que se muestra para el control asociado en una superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> property is not defined for the associated control, it is set to `Gainsboro`, and the control is displayed with that background color.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A> propiedad no está definida para el control asociado, se establece en `Gainsboro`, y el control se muestra con ese color de fondo.

trans-unit.source: After this is done, the base implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Una vez hecho esto, la implementación base de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> se llama al método.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el componente de origen de datos desde el contenedor de control asociado, resuelto en un miembro de datos concreto.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> containing the design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" />, resolved to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember" /> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que contiene la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" /> en tiempo de diseño, que se resuelve en la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember" /> del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método `null` si un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> no se encuentra la propiedad, o si un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> con el mismo nombre no existe.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> cannot be resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> no se puede resolver como el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A> propiedad del control asociado, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> devuelve un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interfaz que contiene el tiempo de diseño <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el componente de origen de datos del contenedor del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface and containing the design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" /> of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa una interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> y que contiene la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource" /> en tiempo de diseño del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method returns `null` if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> property is not found, or if a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> with the same name does not exist.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método `null` si un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> no se encuentra la propiedad, o si un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A> con el mismo nombre no existe.

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> that implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Control derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> que implementa una interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara el diseñador para poder ver, modificar y diseñar el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: El host del diseñador llama el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método cuando esté listo para usar el diseñador para representar el control que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> (método) y sus métodos base configuran propiedades y conectarse a los eventos que son necesarios para el funcionamiento del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, that is associated with this designer or is a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: El `component` parámetro es el control derivado de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>, que está asociado a este diseñador o una copia de ese control.

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method in a designer derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class to ensure that only instances of a control class named `SimpleRadioButtonList` are used by the custom designer.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente código en el ejemplo se reemplaza el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> método en un diseñador que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> clase para garantizar que solo las instancias de una clase de control se denominan `SimpleRadioButtonList` se usa el diseñador personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Se llama cuando ha cambiado el origen de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Se llama cuando ha cambiado el origen de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método base conecta el control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> objeto en el origen de datos actual y, si es diferente del origen de datos al que se conectó el control, actualiza el marcado en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método actualiza el marcado en tiempo de diseño después de conectarse al origen de datos actual.

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method in a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente código de ejemplo reemplaza el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método en una clase que hereda de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el origen de datos que es asociado con los cambios de la clase de diseñador, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> se llama al método y este código establece una variable denominada `changedDataSource` a `true`.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> that indicates whether the design-time markup is to be unconditionally updated.
trans-unit.target: Estructura <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> que indica si el marcado en tiempo de diseño se va a actualizar de forma incondicional.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Este parámetro se ignora.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Se llama cuando ha cambiado el origen de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> class to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método base conecta el control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> clase al origen de datos actual y, si es diferente del origen de datos al que se conectó el control, actualiza el marcado en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method of the designer unconditionally updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método del diseñador actualiza incondicionalmente el marcado en tiempo de diseño después de conectarse al origen de datos actual.

trans-unit.source: The value of `forceUpdateView` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: El valor de `forceUpdateView` se omite.

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method in a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente código de ejemplo reemplaza el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método en una clase que hereda de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el origen de datos que es asociado con los cambios de la clase de diseñador, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> se llama y este código establece una variable denominada `changedDataSource` a `true`.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: Callers should use the public <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged" /> override.
trans-unit.target: Los llamadores deben usar público <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged" /> invalidar.

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the added or shadowed properties to expose for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Colección que implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> de las propiedades agregadas o propiedades reemplazadas para exponérselas al control asociado en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove additional properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: La usa el diseñador para quitar o agregar propiedades en la presentación de la cuadrícula **Propiedades**, o para reemplazar propiedades del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Diseñadores de controles utilizan métodos que se derivan de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sombrear las diversas propiedades de control con propiedades en tiempo de diseño correspondientes que el diseñador implementa, y para quitar propiedades o agregar propiedades a la **propiedades** cuadrícula.

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter> attribute to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Para los controles que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> objeto, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> agrega la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter> atribuir a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> propiedades del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para agregar propiedades o cambiar atributos de propiedades en la colección de propiedades de tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: Asegúrese de llamar al método base antes de realizar otro procesamiento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated control should render its default action lists.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el control asociado debe representar sus listas de acciones predeterminadas.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Siempre devuelve <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A> property returns `false` so that a data source dropdown is not displayed with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A> propiedad devuelve `false` para que no se muestra una lista desplegable de origen de datos con la **Elegir origen de datos** elemento de menú en el **tareas comunes** menú contextual.

trans-unit.source: Instead, this menu item displays the **Choose Data Source** dialog box, which allows the user to select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, este elemento de menú muestra la **Elegir origen de datos** cuadro de diálogo que permite al usuario seleccionar un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList" /> property to return <see langword="true" /> if you want the control that is derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> class to display a data source dropdown with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList" /> propiedad para devolver <see langword="true" /> si desea que el control que se deriva de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl" /> clase para mostrar una lista desplegable de origen de datos con la **Elegir origen de datos** elemento de menú en el ** Tareas comunes** menú contextual en tiempo de diseño.
